Name: French Diamond
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This citrusy cognac-laced cocktail is fruity and edging towards the sweet side of balanced with maple syrup, lemon and orange juice.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Ciprian Zsraga at The Hoxton Pony in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of French Diamond contains 212 calories
